articles.title: Russell Crowe makes bombshell admission about his Oscar-winning movie Gladiator - Daily Mail
articles.description: Russell Crowe has revealed he had major reservations about acting in his 2000 hit movie Gladiator, branding the script as 'absolute rubbish'.
articles.content:
